# FormGuard - The Modern Form Backend for Developers

FormGuard is a complete backend solution for your HTML forms. It handles submission capture, spam filtering, and data storage, while providing powerful AI-driven insightsâ€”all without you writing a single line of backend code.

## Why FormGuard?

- **Zero Backend Required:** specialized endpoints instantly ready to accept form data.
- **AI-Powered Insights:** Automatically summarizes submissions and detects trends using Gemini Pro models.
- **Edge Performance:** Built on Cloudflare's global edge network for <50ms latency.
- **Spam Protection:** Built-in intelligent spam filtering.

## How to Use

### 1. Create a Form
Log in to the [FormGuard Dashboard](https://formguard.strivio.world/dashboard) and create a new form. You will receive a unique **Endpoint ID**.

### 2. Connect Your Form
Point your HTML form's `action` attribute to your unique FormGuard endpoint.

#### HTML Example
```html
<form action="https://formguard.strivio.world/api/submit/{your-endpoint-id}" method="POST">
  <input name="email" type="email" placeholder="email@example.com" required />
  <textarea name="message" placeholder="Your message..."></textarea>
  <button type="submit">Send</button>
</form>
```

#### JSON / Fetch Example
You can also submit data via JavaScript/AJAX using JSON.

```javascript
await fetch("https://formguard.strivio.world/api/submit/{your-endpoint-id}", {
  method: "POST",
  headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
  body: JSON.stringify({
    email: "user@example.com",
    message: "I love FormGuard!"
  }),
});
```

### 3. View Submissions
Go to your dashboard to view real-time submissions, read AI-generated summaries, and export your data.

## API Reference

### POST `/api/submit/:endpointId`

**Parameters:**
- `endpointId` (string, required): The unique ID of your form found in the dashboard.

**Headers:**
- `Content-Type`: `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`, `multipart/form-data`, or `application/json`.
- `Accept`: `application/json` (optional, to receive JSON response instead of redirect).

**Response:**
- **Success (200/303):** Redirects to the configured success URL (or default thank you page). If JSON is requested, returns `{ success: true }`.
- **Error (4xx/5xx):** Returns error details if submission fails (e.g., spam detected, rate limit exceeded).

## Features

- **Spam Filtering:** We analyze request metadata and content to block bot submissions automatically.
- **Instant Notifications:** (Coming Soon) Webhook integrations for Slack, Discord, and Email.
- **Data Export:** Download all your submissions as standard CSV/JSON formats.
